thread.title: Ground News - Ukraine official says drone debris hits Odesa high-rise building
thread.title_full: Ground News - Ukraine official says drone debris hits Odesa high-rise building

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Ukraine official says drone debris hits Odesa high-rise building
text:
Summary by Ground News Russian forces launched attack drones at Odesa Oblast late at night on Dec. 28. Ukrainian air defense units shot down one of the drones, causing debris to strike a high-rise building and start a fire. Governor Oleh Kiper said that casualties and details of the damage are still under investigation. Share menu More

Devdiscourse Center High Factuality Ukraine official says drone debris hits Odesa high-rise building Ukraine official says drone debris hits Odesa high-rise building A fire broke out at a multi-story building in the Black Sea port city of Odesa late on Thursday after drones were reported to be headed for the area, authorities said. "A high-rise building in Odesa was damaged by a downed drone," Oleh Kiper, the regional governor, said in a post on the Telegram messaging app.He said information about casualties was being verified and urged townsp…
